Name: Guns N Stuff 2
About the game: Guns N Stuff 2 A fast-paced third-person shooter with up to eight players. Fight with a variety of 40+ weapons on 40+ maps. Grab a weapon as quickly as possible, whether it is a simple pistol or a viking helmet, and get to killing. ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Online 8 player PVP Free for all or Team-Based ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A wave-based zombies shooter mode that can be played with 1-8 players. Features 9 different zombies 3 zombie bosses Roguelite items system Discord Link
